rule.name: dynamic_CheckBoxField
rule.definition: = load( local!checkBoxField_label: "label", local!checkBoxField_instructions: "instructions", local!checkBoxField_required: { 2 }, local!checkBoxField_disabled: { 2 }, local!checkBoxField_choiceLabels: "[Choice 1][Choice 2][Choice 3][Choice 4]", local!checkBoxField_value: { 1 }, with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayoutColumns"( label: "Dynamic Sail Component", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Label value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!checkBoxField_label, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_label ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Instructions", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Instructions value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!checkBoxField_instructions, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_instructions ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"( label: "Required", instructions: "Checked=true, Unchecked=false", required: false, disabled: false, choiceLabels: { "True", "False" }, value: local!checkBoxField_required, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_required ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"( label: "Disabled", instructions: "Checked=true, Unchecked=false", required: false, disabled: false, choiceLabels: { "True", "False" }, value: local!checkBoxField_disabled, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_disabled ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Choice Labels", instructions: "Enter choices in boxes [], eg. [choice5][choice6][etc..]", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!checkBoxField_choiceLabels, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_choiceLabels ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Value", instructions: "Enter number of pre-selected choice for the dynamic Value value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!checkBoxField_value, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_value ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxFieldByIndex"( label: local!checkBoxField_label, instructions: local!checkBoxField_instructions, required: if( local!checkBoxField_required = 1, "true", "false" ), disabled: if( local!checkBoxField_disabled = 1, "true", "false" ), choiceLabels: extract(local!checkBoxField_choiceLabels,"[","]"), value: local!checkBoxField_value, saveInto: local!checkBoxField_value ) } ) } ) ) )
